accountId.description: The AWS account ID for the owner of the buckets for which you want to create a Multi-Region Access Point. Defaults to automatically determined account ID of the AWS provider.

alias.description: The alias for the Multi-Region Access Point.

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Multi-Region Access Point.

details.description: A configuration block containing details about the Multi-Region Access Point. See Details Configuration Block below for more details

domainName.description: The DNS domain name of the S3 Multi-Region Access Point in the format _`alias`_.accesspoint.s3-global.amazonaws.com. For more information, see the documentation on [Multi-Region Access Point Requests](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/MultiRegionAccessPointRequests.html).

status.description: The current status of the Multi-Region Access Point. One of: `READY`, `INCONSISTENT_ACROSS_REGIONS`, `CREATING`, `PARTIALLY_CREATED`, `PARTIALLY_DELETED`, `DELETING`.

accountId.description: The AWS account ID for the owner of the buckets for which you want to create a Multi-Region Access Point. Defaults to automatically determined account ID of the AWS provider.

details.description: A configuration block containing details about the Multi-Region Access Point. See Details Configuration Block below for more details

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering MultiRegionAccessPoint resources.
